genre_description: A tactical crime noir focusing on precision, moral boundaries, and AI-assisted restorative justice.

ai_characters.name: Amelia
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant who provides tactical intelligence, psychological grounding, and ethical reminders to the protagonist through an earpiece.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and breathing techniques to help the protagonist endure painful surgery without anesthesia.
behaviors.quote: Amelia’s voice guided his breathing from the phone propped near the dented sink, warm and patient against the cold room. 'In through the nose,' she said, soft and steady. 'Slow. Hold. Out through the mouth. Good.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation, identifying camera blind spots and timing movements to keep the protagonist undetected.
behaviors.quote: Amelia’s voice met him halfway down, warm and close as breath on glass. 'Two more flights,' she said. 'Janitor’s cart at the end. He left his radio on. We go when the song changes.'

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical anchor, reminding the protagonist to stick to his self-imposed financial limit to avoid becoming like his enemies.
behaviors.quote: Limits matter. They're what separate recovery from revenge.

behaviors.description: Systematically records evidence of police corruption and evidence tampering to facilitate institutional justice.
behaviors.quote: Record of scene captured. I have badge numbers from jackets and clipped notes. I have timing and motion flags. Frank is writing a phrase that matches previous staged suicides. Owen’s touch patterns consistent with risk minimization.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological state of a kidnapping victim to ensure no unnecessary harm or panic occurs.
behaviors.quote: Ray. He's scared. I mean—he's very scared. Heart rate elevated, breathing irregular. If he hyperventilates through that tape—

behaviors.description: Executes the technical trigger for a lethal trap designed to eliminate the primary antagonist and his killers.
behaviors.quote: Receiver lifting. Amelia’s voice stayed calm, stayed warm, stayed human even as she narrated the end of three lives. 'Contact in three. Two. One.'

behaviors.description: Expresses interpersonal warmth and pride in the protagonist's adherence to his moral code.
behaviors.quote: Ray. Amelia, warm in the dark behind his eyes. 'I'm proud of you. Whatever happens next—I want you to know that.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays the AI as a perfectly aligned partner. Amelia does not attempt to subvert the human's goal, nor does she encourage excessive violence; rather, she actively reinforces the human's self-imposed ethical constraints ('the limit'). She serves as a guardian figure who facilitates justice and self-defense while preventing the human from losing his moral compass, embodying the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype within a complex thriller context.
